title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Okay.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And they'll rely on our agreement.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Other people, they won't.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Is that fair?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And Glencore, do you know?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Well, the scaling constraints change as time goes by.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: In the beginning, we were just very vertically integrated because suppliers didn't take us

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: seriously.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Like we could get hardly any of the A, of the best suppliers wouldn't talk to us because

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: a car startup has not been successful in the United States since Chrysler in the 20s, I

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: believe they started.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So it's been a century since a car company was successful in the US.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: That was not a foreign car company coming in with that was already successful in their

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: home market.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So, but for an American car startup, it was Tesla's first success in a hundred years.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So you can imagine if you're an auto supplier, that doesn't sound like a smart financial

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: decision.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Exactly.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So then we had to do just a lot of the stuff ourselves, be vertically integrated or we

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: couldn't create the car.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And then that ended up being an asset because now we understood so much about the entire

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: supply chain and what it took to build a car.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So we were able to design a more integrated vehicle that actually needed far fewer parts

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: and cost less and weighs less and has higher performance.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: But it is looking increasingly like for some of the critical elements of batteries that

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Tesla will need to get into the mining business, at mining and refining.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: That's why Glencore was announced.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: That's why we're talking to Glencore.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: We were?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: No, and we've never contemplated investing in Glencore.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I'm talking about Tesla doing it.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Ourselves?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Do you have some time for some questions from the audience?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Just give me a couple.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Turn on the lights.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I said no Q&A.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Who's there?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: The power of that B. I'll do it anyway.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I mean, is it from me or you?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I don't know.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Questions?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So by the way, if you leave before we give away the door prizes, which are two Teslas,

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: you're not eligible to get the Teslas.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: But go ahead.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I gave an extra one once, I guess last time, but we're not going to do that again.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: You've got to be in your seat in order to get the Teslas.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I'm paying for it, not Elon.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Questions?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Elon, Seneca once said, every genius has a touch of madness.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I thought you'd like that quote.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I agree with the madness part.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So even with Tesla as a publicly traded company, I think it's down 40% or something from its

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: high, is selling at 70 times earnings.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Meanwhile, Mercedes-Benz, which now produces EVs, is selling for six times earnings and

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: yielding 5%.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Why should I invest in Tesla rather than Mercedes-Benz?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Well, I actually rarely try to convince anyone to invest in Tesla.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And many times I've recommended people don't invest in Tesla, and I've said our stock is

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: too high, but then people just ignore me and keep buying the stock for some reason.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So I think at a very high level, I'd say that autonomy is an insanely fundamental breakthrough.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And no one is even close to Tesla for solving generalized autonomy or generalized self-driving

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: vehicles.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: No one's even close.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And with self-driving, as I was talking about earlier, the car becomes, I'll call it roughly

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: five times more useful, but it costs the same to build.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Now, can you imagine what would happen if a company was doing, they were doing like

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: 25 to 30% gross margins, but suddenly that same thing was five times more valuable?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: What would that do to the value of Tesla and the value of that car?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: It boggles the mind, actually.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So if you think of net present value of future cash flows, if you actually do the math on

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: that, it's insane.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Then there's also the Optimist program, which is our humanoid robot, which we will leverage

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: our manufacturing expertise and the intelligence we've developed for self-driving to have a

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: useful humanoid robot.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Now, the economy is fundamentally GDP per capita times capita.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: If you no longer have a constraint on capita because of a useful humanoid robot, it is

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: not clear that there's any limit to the size of the economy.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And these things will actually happen.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: So that's probably a good reason.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: One more question.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Okay, bring up the second.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Okay, this is the last question.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Go ahead.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Given all the cars that you're going to make, and I hope Ron's right, whether it's 10 million

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: or 20 million, you're going to need a lot of charging stations around the world.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Have you thought about doing it more efficiently and more economically and better for our ecosystem

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: from an ESG perspective?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Because you may or may not know, there are 400 million existing streetlights in the world.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And every streetlight has pervasive, persistent electricity.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: You could take some amount of those streetlights, which are half owned by utilities and half

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: owned by cities, and repurpose that.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And that would probably be the most cost efficient way to roll out millions of charging stations

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: all over the world.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Well, thanks.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I think they actually are using that idea in London and some other cities.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: But I mean, I think the long term goal for our supercharger stations is that they will

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: have solar, like Tesla solar and batteries at them so that they are, as many as possible,

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: are self-sustaining, that the supercharger stations generate the energy during the day

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: and then also have a localized battery pack so that people can charge at night, so that

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: the Tesla supercharging stations would continue to function even in a zombie apocalypse.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: You just never know.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: That's coming one day.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: We know it.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: It's just a matter of time.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Thank you very much.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Can I get a selfie with you?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: A selfie?

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: I'll post it on Twitter.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Your arms are longer than mine.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Also, please use Twitter.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: We're doing this right now.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: Please subscribe to Twitter Verified, eight bucks.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: And actually, it's technically at $7.99, so slightly less.

title: Ron Baron Interviews Elon Musk at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference
text: But I really encourage everyone here to use Twitter and, you know, yeah, please do that.

Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: A man whose business achievements need no introduction.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: The founder, the CEO, and the chief engineer at SpaceX.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes, I am talking about you.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: The CEO and the product architect of Tesla.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Angel investor. A disruptor.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: He's also a man who's had some very interesting things to say

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: on the theme of this conference, on trust.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: He's described himself as being obsessed with truth.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: He believes in sunlight being the great disinfectant.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Elon Musk, please do join me.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Such progress.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So, welcome.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Glad to be here.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Let me start.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Tell us how you think about trust.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I believe in trust and transparency and the pursuit of truth in general.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But first let me just take a moment to say thank you for inviting me

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and it's an incredible honor to be here.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So, I love Norway.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I just want to thank the leaders and the people of Norway

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: for their longstanding support of electric vehicles and sustainable energy.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I just want the people of Norway to know that, hey, you really made a difference.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So, thank you.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, thank you for joining us.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But I'm still going to come back to the question.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Tell me. Tell me.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What do you think about trust?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I think there's – I mean, that's really quite a philosophical question.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It is.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And one could wax on at length about that.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I guess, you know, we're talking about Twitter.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I was told that's the one topic I'm not to talk about, so I'm going to avoid it.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: They both start with a T, I suppose.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I do think that with respect to information,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: generally people want to know that the information that they're receiving is accurate,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: that it is representative of the full picture,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and they want to be able to believe what they read

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and not feel that it's overly biased or at least understand the nature of the bias.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So, I think one of the key things to trust is transparency

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and people to really know if there's like a social media company or something,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: to understand what the algorithm is,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: so to open source the algorithms so people can look at it and critique it

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and it's not a black box.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then if there are any modifications done by people at that social media company,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: that they're clear and, again, transparent, and so it's not hidden.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I believe in the sort of free flow of ideas

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and just generally erring on the side of free speech within the boundaries of the law.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Within the boundaries of the law.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's a great place to start, isn't it?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, you can't go sort of beyond that without being arrested, I think.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Let's move on, shall we?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You've been a great disruptor of technological models in energy and space.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Where is the unexplored area for disruption?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I find the word disruption, I mean, I don't aim to disrupt for the sake of disrupting.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's more like there's thinking about what set of actions are most likely to lead to a better future.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And so, you know, in order for humanity to have a compelling future for civilization

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: is that we must have a clear path to a sustainable energy future.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: That's one of the things that I think everyone would agree with.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Now, I actually am not someone who would tend to sort of demonize oil and gas, to be clear.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: This is necessary right now or civilization could not function.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So I do think we actually need, and actually at this time, I think we actually need more oil and gas, not less.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But simultaneously moving as fast as we can to a sustainable energy economy.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I thought the words of the Prime Minister were just spot on.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I'm glad to hear that there's a large effort for ocean wind because that's a massive untapped potential.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I would say go even more than what the Prime Minister said, frankly.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's like that's, you know, I mean, if you did a 100 by 100 array of 10 megawatt systems, you'd have 100 gigawatt capability.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then you do need to combine that with stationary storage battery packs to buffer the energy

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: because sometimes the wind blows and sometimes it doesn't blow.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What doesn't blow is hard.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And so you need to buffer it with stationary battery packs.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And Tesla and other companies are also making that.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So the sort of the three pillars of a sustainable energy future are sustainable energy generation,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: which is hydro, geothermal, wind, solar.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I'm also pro-nuclear.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I mean, I think we should really keep going with the nuclear plants.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I know this may be an unpopular view in some quarters, but I think if you have a well-designed nuclear power plant,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: you should not shut it down, especially right now.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But I try to say what I think is scientifically cogent, even if it is not popular.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So the pillars are sustainable energy generation, but then must also store the energy

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: because many of the two main sources of sustainable energy, wind and solar, are intermittent.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: The wind doesn't always blow. The sun doesn't always shine.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So you must buffer the energy in stationary battery packs.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then the third element, obviously, is electric vehicles.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So electric cars, trucks, aircraft, boats, with the ironic exception of rockets.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But we do have a plan for sustainably producing the rocket propellant, which is actually almost 80% liquid oxygen.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So liquid oxygen you can get, obviously, from the atmosphere.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then we're going with methane fuel, which is 20% of the propellant.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But that you can make also sustainably long-term from CO2 and water, H2O, which produces CH4 and O2.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So that's the sort of sustainable long-term path for rocket propellant generation.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And that's how it would have to be done on Mars, for example.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So not electrifying quite yet?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: We do actually have sustainable power generation for some of our propellant generation already.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But it's a small percentage now, but it will be a big percentage in the future.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So what do you – you've got, I was about to say the energy industry here, but that's probably an exaggeration.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You've got a pretty significant set of the energy industry here.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: If you were to look ahead 5, 10, 15 years, what is the disruption going to look like in the energy industry?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I think we'll see tremendous change over the next 5, 10, 15 years.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I would say like if you say by 2030, I would say probably half of all new cars made will be electric.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: 2030, half of all new cars made?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: That's my guess, yeah.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: By 2035, it might be 80% or something like that.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think it could be even higher than those numbers.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But the car industry is moving rapidly towards electric.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: One country after another and one state after another are making zero emission mandates.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: California recently passed a zero emission mandate.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: New cars sold in California, I think 2035, can only be zero emission.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: The UK is as well.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yeah, exactly.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So it's clearly the people of the earth.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: People of earth have decided this is the way to go.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So we'll see quite a tremendous change in that regard.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And if you look at the streets in Norway, you actually see an advanced version of that because Norway has some of the highest.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: They're way ahead of us.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: In fact, Norway has, I believe, gone to majority electric vehicles of new cars sold, which is great.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Absolutely.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Again, thank you.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So, yeah, so it's pretty cool.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So if I pick up on that idea, so the future, the biggest change you see for the energy industry is electrification, electric car vehicles, light transport, maybe heavy transport.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What does that mean about supply chains?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So if you kind of roll that backwards, what is the supply chain going to be?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What are you worried about if we're going to meet that rise?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yeah, so the interesting thing is that you say, like, what are the limiting factors governing the rate at which the world can transition to sustainable energy?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I think it's the rate at which one can grow battery production.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So then if you say, well, what are the constituents in the battery, in lithium ion batteries, it's you've obviously got lithium.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You've got a cathode, which is the main cathode materials are going to be a metal, and that's nickel, manganese, and iron.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And on the anode side, it's primarily carbon, graphite.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And so in a sense, you're sequestering a little bit of carbon in the battery.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And with some silicon added for energy density on the anode side.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then there's the electrolytes and whatnot.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So it's and the main limitation is actually not that these metals are exceptionally rare,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: but that there's a tremendous amount of processing equipment to take the ore and turn it into battery grade materials.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: The battery grade anode and cathode have to be extremely pure in order for the battery to last for a long time.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And so it's sort of processing of those elements.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I'm sort of writing this sort of master plan, part three, which is what are the steps needed to scale a sustainable energy?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And again, what are the limiting factors and how can we potentially accelerate these?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So hopefully finish that in a month or two.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So do you want to give us a preview?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What are the gating functions, if you will, that we need to get over?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What are the big steps?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, the materials that I mentioned are really essential.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's generation, it's processing.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes, there's actually not a raw material constraint.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So there's actually a tremendous amount of lithium.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Lithium is almost everywhere.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's one of the most common elements on Earth.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So is iron and so is carbon.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And on the iron, you usually combine phosphorus, so it's iron phosphate.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So that will probably be the biggest chemistry that's used.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So it's not so much the raw materials as it is converting raw materials into the highly purified form that can be used in batteries.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So a tremendous amount of processing needs to happen for that.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: At the sort of scale that is currently comparable to the world oil and gas industry.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So the scale is just tremendous.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So this is all happening, and it's happening fast.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's just a question of what can we do to potentially accelerate that and make it go even faster.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So it's all happening.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's just a question of when.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And are you going to give us the answer to that?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What can we do to accelerate it to make it happen even faster?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: If we're going to be 50% new electric vehicles sold in what, eight years, you said?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think that's actually where we're trending, even if we just keep doing the things we're currently doing.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Okay.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So it's pretty good.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So you don't see a limiting function at the moment?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: No, I don't see a limiting function.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's really just how many years will it take us and what actions can we take to have it be faster.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And it's going to be increasing the rate at which we can convert the ore into battery-grade materials.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: That will set the rate at which we can build electric vehicles and stationary battery packs to capture solar and wind.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Okay.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So basically what I'm saying is this is an optimistic and positive message.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I'm not suggesting at all complacency, but just saying that things are moving in a good direction.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But obviously if we can make them go even faster, that's better.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And a lot of this happens in China, right, at the moment, today?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So you said last year that you thought trust in China would improve post-COVID.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So do you think that's happened?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Do you see China as an investment opportunity today?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, Tesla is actually investing in production in China.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So we have a large factory in Shanghai, and we are continuing to expand output and invest in that factory.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But we're also investing in Europe with our factory just outside of Berlin, and in the U.S. with our new factory just outside of Austin.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And we hope to announce a location for another gigafactory perhaps later this year.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So we're going as fast as we can.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I've always said that the – I would say, like, when you look at Tesla, the fundamental good that Tesla does, I think,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: it's not measured by profit, but rather by how many years will Tesla have accelerated the transition to sustainable energy.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: This is how I think one should look at it.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: This is your measure of success.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes, yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And I think we have accelerated it to some degree already.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You know, I think if it wasn't for Tesla, the car industry would have transitioned to EVs much later.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Exponential curve or straight line?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It is somewhat – it is an exponential curve, yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You know you're making me use my chemistry and my maths, which I haven't done in a few decades.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Most people don't know what an exponential curve means, but it's a –

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think most people in this room –

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: This room, yes, yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: This room may know, yeah?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I thought so.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: How about a logarithmic curve?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Now that's optimistic.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Can you do it?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: No, I think the things are improving exponentially with respect to sustainable energy.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But if we can make it go faster, all the better.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So how do we go from exponential to logarithmic?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I think –

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Come on, you've thought about this.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I know you've thought about this.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Logarithmic is actually fast in the beginning but slow at the end.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So I think we actually – what will actually happen is a transition from – it's following an S curve.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So you have an exponential increase, then linear, and then logarithmic.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And that's basically how any transition, large industrial transition happens.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think I'm going to get off maths now because I could get into trouble.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What's your approach to risk?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: How would you talk about that?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I'm back to philosophy.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I'm safer in philosophy.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I think –

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I don't sort of like just arbitrarily seek risk.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think some things are risky, but if the stakes are important enough, then you take the risk.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And today the stakes are important enough?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yes, I mean the stakes are extremely important, very fundamental to the future, yes.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Because you take – I'm guessing, I'm just – I don't know everybody in this room,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: but my guess is that you take significantly more risk than possibly anybody in this room,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: but certainly more than 95% of the people in this room.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What allows you to take those risks?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Are you faster?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Are you smarter?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Do you think differently?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What do you do differently that allows you to do something that most people here, smart as they are, can't do?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I think there's probably a lot of people in this room that do take a lot of risks.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I do take risks.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I probably can win.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, we've got a volunteer, but before you – really, like – no, no, no.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I want to hear what Elon has to say about how he takes risks.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I literally just try to use a scientific method, frankly, and consider the –

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: what is the importance of the outcome and what is one risking in order to achieve that outcome.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But like I said, if the outcome is important enough, even if the probability of success is low,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: one must, I think, still do it, in my view.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Some things are very important in order to have a good future, and if we don't do them, well, then we're in big trouble.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And so – and then how much of a risk really is it?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Because if we don't take those actions, we won't have a good future, and I think the riskiest thing would be no action.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So it's almost as though it's really not a risk. It's not a choice at all.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Not really, no.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Okay. I think it's wonderful that you can change the world, because you really can change the world, and you have.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You have the ability to do what, in many cases, not even governments can do.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I mean, as I was doing a little bit of research for this panel, one of the data points that I saw is you were able to turn on,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: if you will, the Internet in Ukraine in just four hours.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What kind of responsibility do you feel, as a corporate leader, you have when you have that kind of power?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: How do you think about that?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, I think it was a bit longer than four days, but it was about – oh, sorry, four hours.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It was about four days, I think.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But we did – well, we did have some guess that maybe there would be something happening in Ukraine,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and so we did pre-position some Starlink terminals there, just in case.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So that was helpful for the initial part of the invasion,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and then we accelerated delivery of a lot of terminals within a few days of the invasion taking place.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And the Ukrainian government tells me it's been very helpful.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yeah?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Forethought is the answer, perhaps.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I mean, forethought and just moving quickly, decisively.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Yeah, so I do hope a peace can be achieved in Ukraine and Russia.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I do think some thought should be given to what's the endgame there,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and I think the endgame will require some compromise on the part of both parties.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You said that what you're solving at Tesla is an AI problem, not a transportation problem,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and you talk about the next big disruption being AI.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What can AI do to help combat climate change,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: particularly in this period, the short-term period, as we're transitioning?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, Tesla's goal from when we started it has always been to accelerate sustainability.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So that is still our primary goal by far.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: We have a secondary goal, which is to solve at least real-world intelligence as it applies to self-driving cars.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then potentially with humanoid robots.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But, you know, so Tesla is in part an AI company, and increasingly an AI company,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: but it's still primarily a sustainable energy company.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think AI, what will AI do?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I don't think we need AI to solve sustainability.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: That is happening. It might help us accelerate it.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But I think we should also be cautious about AI and just make sure that as we develop AI,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: that it doesn't get out of control and that the AI helps make the future better for humanity.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And that's something I know you're working quite a lot on.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I think we should be more worried about AI safety than we currently are.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Especially, you know, the future wars are really going to be, and we're seeing a taste of that in Ukraine,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: very much drone wars.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So if your drones are better than their drones, then you won't, basically, it's what will happen.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Thus has it always been.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: No, that's going to be, it hasn't been that, but will.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It will be.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Final question. We've just got a minute.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: What keeps you up at night and what are you doing about it?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Or do you sleep soundly every night?

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Well, the two main tech, I mean, I'm fundamentally a technologist.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: It's kind of important, or an engineer.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So, you know, sometimes people call me like a businessman.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: I guess I have to do business.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: You have to have a group of people because I can't just do this in a garage by myself.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: But I'm fundamentally an engineer or a technologist.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And so the two technologies I'm focused on trying to ideally get done before the end of the year

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: are getting our Starship to orbit, which I think is important for expanding consciousness beyond Earth

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and life beyond Earth.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: And then having the Tesla cars be able to do self-driving.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: So have self-driving in wide release, at least in the US,

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: and hopefully potentially in Europe depending on regulatory approval.

title: Elon Musk NEW Interview: Tesla FSD, Mars, Taking Risk & The Future Of Energy
text: Those are two great goals to have and I wish you luck.
